title: Kids Know How To Occupy Themselves. We Need To Let Them Do It
description: American parents often feel like event planners for their kids. There's a pressure to make sure kids are entertained and content every minute of the day. NPR's Michaeleen Doucleff says kids can be trained to occupy themselves.
